message.body: a book and the rain....can we reschedule?
I am backing out of our date....I spent a good bit of time messing in the yard yesterday and feel it today!!! I think I would like to lay in my bed with
Yes that sounds fine. Please rest well!!
Thanks Mon....
Are you free weds afternoon around 2:30 or 3? I can text you when I'm getting off work with an estimated arrival time.
I have two out of the house deals on wed. I could do tea on Friday afternoon....
I'm in school Friday 8-8. :(
What about weds morning? Is that any better? I have to leave for work at 10:30.
Nope. Wed is a wash....Thursday Afternoon?:or next weekend....
Thursday I'm in school 8-6.
And I'm in NYC next weekend. What about Thursday May 30 late morning? Like 10:30?
Nope. City council resolution presentation.
Oh wait
Nope meeting
Booo
Aw! Weds the 29th around 2:30 or 3? I may have school that night which will give us less time but we could try for this? I'm sorry this is so hard!!
Or same day 9:30?
Nope..teaching all day.
First weekend in June?
Oh my gosh!
Yup
I'm in school Saturdays now till 3. And so far sleep all day Sundays! But I could do Sunday June 2 around 1:30 or so I think. Does that work for you?
Yes and I am writing it in the calendar right now!!!!! Lol whew!!
Me too! Are you doing ok? Do you need anything?
I am doing pretty good. I am anxious to get back to yoga but my body is making me take it slowly. I was thinking I may be able to do a restorative class.
The issue is that I get tired so easy.....
I understand that! Let me know if you need anything. This is an opportunity to really rest.
I am trying . It is hard. my bed
And I are good friends these days
I know it's hard. I had a month long surgery recovery where I couldn't walk or stand for more than 30 minutes at a time. Lots of movies.
Yeah .
Lots of old TV shows
Lots of sleep. :)
Yup that too. Heading that way now. Talk soon!! Hugs
Sleep well!!
